2072.subject: ASAP
2072.descrlong: Provides tutorial support for ENGCOM A courses. Students work in small groups or in an individual semester-long appointment with a tutor from the Academic Skills Achievement Program (ASAP) and receive assistance on course assignments, readings, and study skills.  Must be taken concurrently with a course that satisfies the ENGCOM A University Learning Requirement. Credit/no credit only. (Offered every semester.)
